item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 26 Jan 2021
item.description:
1. How to get pleasant documentation for a library using Dune?
  2. Alt-Ergo 2.4.0 release
  3. First release of Art - Adaptive Radix Tree in OCaml
  4. perf demangling of OCaml symbols (and a short introduction to perf)
  5. Decimal 0.2.1 - arbitrary-precision decimal floating point
  6. Basic GitLab CI configuration
  7. OCaml Office Hours?
  8. json-data-encoding 0.9
  9. VSCode OCaml Platform v1.6.0
  10. release 0.3.0 of drom, the OCaml project creator
